oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: President Wilson addressing Congress on question of international peace and imminent danger of war with Germany
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: President Woodrow Wilson addressing Congress and announcing that the United States had severed diplomatic ties with Germany.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Wilson, Woodrow, 1856-1924
